document_data.name: Charl
document_data.mainbody: '''Charl''' was a [[halfling]] who lived in [[Neverwinter]] in the late years of the 15{{Th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Activities: Charl was a member of the [[Dead Rats]], although he wasn't committed to their cause. He even wasn't a [[wererat]].
document_data.History:
Charl was the one who helped to create the alliance between the [[Harpers]] and the [[Sons of Alagondar]]. He later did the same with for the alliance between the [[Sons of Alagondar#The Nashers|Nashers]] and the Dead Rats of Neverwinter.

In [[1479 DR]], Charl instigated a crowd of followers of the "[[Seldra Tylmarande|Lost Heir]]" of [[Alagondar]] to attack some [[adventurer]]s hired by [[Dagult Neverember]] to investigate the "Lost Heir". Charl and his followers were defeated, however, and Charl's fate was for the adventurers to decide.
